Nightstrike::

Nightstrike moved quickly and avoided the shot. "You should better 
come back home"said Nightsrike "or you will be a dead bot"

Nightrike fired 25 times against Dark Rat


--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Dark Rat tried to leap backwards to avoid the torrent of unforgiving
> metal ripping through the air, but he had lost track of his
> surroundings, and smashed into the wall of the arena. He lost his
> ballance, and tried to regain his footing, but it was to late, the
> bullets began to turn his armor into swiss cheese. "Arrrrggghhhh." 
he
> screamed, and fell to his knee, "You will pay for that, 
Decepticon." he
> spat, as he shifted his wait onto one hand, to hold up his plasma
> blaster, he pulled the trigger, and a ball of fiery energy erupted, 
then
> he pulled it again, as the recoil caused him to shift around a bit. 
He
> tried to ignore the pain of his internally leaking oil.
